translation.en: Do you believe in love at first sight?
translation.es: ¿Crees en el amor a primera vista?.

translation.en: Me neither.
Those were the words that started the whole Emma Gale success story.
translation.es: Esas fueron las palabras que dieron inicio al éxito de Emma Gale.

translation.en: And for 20 years and 12 novels, it seemed like nothing could go wrong.
translation.es: Y durante 20 años y 12 novelas, parecía que nada podía salir mal.

translation.en: Until now.
Hello, Ms. Brown. Welcome to The Drew Barrymore Show.
translation.es: Hola. Bienvenida al show de Drew Barrymore.

translation.en: Thank you.
Can't I just go home and wait until this blows over?
translation.es: ¿No puedo ir a casa y esperar a que esto pase?

translation.en: This is not blowing over. This is a Category 5.
translation.es: Esto no va a pasar. Es un huracán de categoría cinco.

translation.en: Do you know how many people hate you because of this book?
translation.es: ¿Sabes cuántas personas te odian por este libro?

translation.en: A lot?
It's showtime.
- I thought you were my friend. - Well, right now, I'm your agent.
translation.es: - Pensé que eras mi amiga. - En este momento soy tu agente.

translation.en: So go out there and charm everybody's pants off.
translation.es: Sal y deja a todos encantados.

translation.en: And try not to look so tall.
translation.es: Y trata de no verte tan alta.

translation.en: It's intimidating.
I suppose it's possible you might not have read a Sophie Brown novel,
translation.es: Supongo que es posible que no hayan leído una novela de Sophie Brown,

translation.en: but trust me, you know somebody who has,
translation.es: pero créanme, conocen a alguien que sí,

translation.en: and, boy, do I have some questions for her.
translation.es: y vaya que tengo preguntas para ella.

translation.en: Hm. Join us in welcoming back my good friend and best- selling author, Sophie Brown!
translation.es: ¡Démosle la bienvenida a mi amiga y autora de bestsellers, Sophie Brown!

translation.en: Thank you. Oh, thank you.
- Hi. - Hi.
Thank you for having me. I'm surprised I made it in alive.
translation.es: Gracias por invitarme. Me alivia haber llegado aquí con vida.

translation.en: I barely did.
All of you viewers, if you wonder what we're talking about,
translation.es: Espectadores, si se preguntan de qué hablamos,

translation.en: I'd say that Sophie Brown has a whole lot of unhappy fans out there.
translation.es: diría que Sophie Brown tiene muchos fans descontentos.

translation.en: Well, I think you might mean former fans.
Well, I guess we're all wondering about the ending of your latest book.
translation.es: Supongo que todos nos preguntamos por el final de tu último libro.

translation.en: I know that the character of Winston charmed many of the readers.
translation.es: Sé que el personaje de Winston encantó a muchos de los lectores.

translation.en: Then why in the world would you kill him?
- The readers, they loved Winston. -
Maybe they just didn't know him like I did.
translation.es: Quizá no lo conocían como yo.

translation.en: We don't always get the happy ending.
translation.es: No todos podemos tener un final feliz.

translation.en: You know, I normally don't do this,
but I have got to agree with the fans out there.
translation.es: pero debo decir que estoy de acuerdo con tus fans.

translation.en: He didn't deserve to fall down the stairs.
translation.es: No merecía caerse por las escaleras.

translation.en: So you're on their side?
Well, you murdered a man that I was in love with.
translation.es: Asesinaste a un hombre del que estaba enamorada.

translation.en: I mean, what gives you the right to take him away?
Well, I'm… I'm the author.
I know, but perhaps you're having a hard time
translation.es: Lo sé, pero tal vez te está costando

translation.en: separating your real life from the fiction in your books.
translation.es: separar tu vida real de la ficción de tus libros.

translation.en: - What? - Well, you've had a rough year.
Your husband left you. You had a very messy divorce.
translation.es: Tu esposo te dejó. Tu divorcio fue muy complicado.

translation.en: Okay, but Winston is a fictional character.
translation.es: Pero Winston es un personaje ficticio.

translation.en: - Was he? - Yes.
And you should be happy that it was a quick death, yeah,
translation.es: Agradezcan que fue una muerte rápida.

translation.en: because I could have extended it for ten pages.
I could have dragged him behind a car. I could have poisoned him with mercury.
translation.es: Podría haberlo arrastrado detrás del auto. Podría haberlo envenenado con mercurio.

translation.en: I could have chopped him into little, teeny pieces
and fed him to the sharks!
- - We'll be right back.
I became a writer so I could write in my pajamas, not so I could get yelled at by strangers.
translation.es: Soy escritora para trabajar en pijama, no para que me griten extraños.

translation.en: I thought you became a writer because of Grandpa.
translation.es: Creí que eras escritora por el abuelo.

translation.en: You used to sit in the barbershop and listen to his stories, right?
translation.es: Te sentabas en la barbería a oír sus historias.

translation.en: Yeah.
About the castle.
- About Scotland. - Mm.
He had told me that he snuck in once.

translation.en: Yep.
He told that one a lot.
Are you sure you're gonna be okay? 'Cause I can come back next weekend.

translation.en: Absolutely not. You stay at school. Don't worry about me. I got this.

translation.en: Okay.
I need to forget about the Emma Gale fiasco for a while.

The castle.
I'll go to Scotland.
It's hidden away, and it's quiet, and nobody knows me there.

You're finally taking a vacation.

A working trip.
Just until the bad press dies down.

translation.en: I promise.
That's me.
Ah, you're American.
Yes.
Nobody told me that.
Whereabouts?
Where are you from?
No. No.

translation.en: - It's not a problem. - Oh. Thank you.
♪ Sometimes we get away with it ♪ ♪ Sometimes we get burned… ♪

- Hamish, no! Hamish, stop! -

Thank you.

I'm checking in.

In our wee village? Dinna be daft.

Not sure I should admit it, but, uh, yes.

translation.en: Wonderful.
- May I ask you a question, then? - Sure.
Why'd you leave it so long to kill off Winston?

- I killed him off. - Good for you, Sophie Brown.

Oh, it's lovely.
That's very kind. I'm sure it's not what you're used to.

…it is exactly what I was hoping for.

Nice to meet you, Maisie. You too.

Since page one, book four. And when have I ever steered you wrong?

translation.en: - The title of book six. - Oh, aside from that!
translation.es: - El título del libro seis. - ¡Aparte de eso!

Good, and when can I expect to see pages?

Uh, no, you've missed the… the gift shop.

translation.en: No, thank you.
Kilts, tea towels, coasters? All with the clan coat of arms, of course.

Well, may your travels be swift.

Several things.

Hi.
- So you work here too? - Wherever they'll have me.

I'm afraid that's not--
It's all right, Thomas. I'll give her a tour.

translation.en: This way.
There are more than 3,000 castles in Scotland.

These grand old ladies hold the proud history

Upper floors.
This here is the music room

Dun Dunbar was built by the first Duke of Dunbar for his wife.

translation.en: - - Hamish! Hamish. - Oh my goodness. Oh! -
- No! No! - Okay. Hi.

Out now. Go on. Get out. Go on!
I'm sorry.
It's okay.

The Dunbars had meetings of the clan and grand celebrations in here.

Twelve bedrooms and ten bathrooms.
I guess the, uh, royal arse needs a lot of thrones.

- Can we go up? - Sorry, not part of the tour.

Can it wait?

I won't be long.
Top
of the circular…

Right. Well, we try.
What was all that about?
Book the wedding.

- Oh, I'd like to see that. - Hi.

Uh, it's been a year since my divorce.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.

Ah, you're one of us, then.
McGuinty. I… I don't think I've heard that name around here.

translation.en: Well, they moved to New York when he was a boy.

translation.en: I was at school with a McGuinty back in the day.

Always blethering and telling the tales.
- - Callum McGuinty?
That's him.

translation.en: McMotormouth.
Oh, you have his smile.
Oh, I don't know why I'm crying.

translation.en: I wish I'd come back sooner. - Well, you're here now. - Mm- hmm.

translation.en: A lot of the old castles are for sale.
Aberdeenshire's cheaper than a Range Rover.
translation.es: Comprar en Aberdeenshire es más barato que una Range Rover.

translation.en: And you'd be more comfortable living in a Range Rover.
translation.es: Es más cómodo vivir en una Range Rover.

translation.en: - Oh, Angus. - Wow. Thank you.
That's great.

I didn't get that feeling.

translation.es: Pues peor. Quieren derribarlo para hacer condominios y un campo de golf.

And it's rather large.
I'm doing the tours and the gift shop.

translation.en: Maybe your own.

I've bent over backwards, keeping you out of foreclosure.

translation.en: No, I can't do that.
- Myles-- - No, it's out of the question!
Uh, Ms. Brown has arrived.
- Sophie Brown. Myles Dunbar. - You're the royal arse?
translation.es: - Sophie Brown. Myles Dunbar. - ¿Tú eres el idiota de la realeza?

translation.es: - ¿Y tú la compradora? - Me hizo creer que trabajaba aquí.

translation.en: It is work being me.

translation.es: No puedes venir a comprar un castillo como una hamburguesa.

translation.en: - Well, you did say it was a drive- through. - I'm not selling to her.
translation.es: - Dijiste que era una parada. - No le venderé nada a ella.

translation.en: Mr. Dunbar.
Technically it's Duke.
Uh, Myles is the 12th Duke of Dunbar.
translation.es: Myles es el duodécimo duque de Dunbar.

translation.en: Oh, well, forgive me, Your Highness.
Technically, it's Your Grace.
I can think of a few other names I'd call you.
And you wouldn't be the first.
And FYI,
the title does not come with the land.
translation.es: el título no viene con la tierra.

translation.en: So if that's what you're after, you can buy a ladyship online for £30.

translation.en: The only title I'm interested in is my next book,
translation.es: El único título que me interesa es el de mi próximo libro,

translation.en: which I'm going to write at Dun Dunbar in the library.
translation.es: que escribiré en la biblioteca del Dun Dunbar.

translation.en: I'm not giving up 500 years of history on someone's whim.

translation.es: - No es un capricho. - ¿Y qué es?

translation.en: Do you believe in love at first sight? No, I don't.
translation.es: - ¿Crees en el amor a primera vista? - No.

translation.en: Me neither.
But if I did, that would be what I felt when I saw Dun Dunbar.
translation.es: Pero si lo hiciera, sería lo que sentí al ver al Dun Dunbar.

translation.en: It felt like home.
Aye. My home.
My father's too.
On the grounds. A long time ago.
